title: Lenovo in the world of AI
body: Lenovo has expanded its hybrid cloud platform for AI with new ThinkAgile hyperconverged solutions and ThinkSystem servers powered by next-gen Intel Xeon Scalable Processors. These enhancements boost AI performance, cloud agility, and energy efficiency. Lenovo's ThinkAgile HX, MX, and VX solutions, optimized for AI, offer faster deployment, backup, and recovery. The portfolio features built-in AI acceleration, advanced management, and end-to-end security. Lenovo TruScale for Hybrid Cloud provides flexible, as-a-service solutions, while new Professional Services for AI assist organizations in effective AI deployment. Additionally, new AI-powered Lenovo laptops enhance user experiences, supporting AI PC tasks with Intel Core Ultra processors.
